product_name: Coghlan's ABS Tent Pegs - Package of 6 - 2005 Closeout
long_description: These Coghlan's ABS Tent Pegs have a rugged design and no-slip hooks for securing your tent at the campground. Sturdy ABS plastic stands up to frequent use. Tent pegs are bright yellow so they're easy to see when you're packing up. Package includes 6 tent pegs in a bag. Closeout.
short_description: These Coghlan's ABS Tent Pegs have a rugged design and no-slip hooks for securing your tent at the campground.
